embed.description: ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.) Firecracker Jinx chroma Several new summoner icons Love Dove Ward * *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes.

replies.body: I think they're on to you HeartVine... Why else release a Valentines skin on Christmas?

They've found my weakness!

QUINN SKINS!!!
Def getting the quinn and garen skin
Pretty cool skin tbh. I think i shall get it myself.
Yes give Riot more $$$$$ that's exactly what they want from you
